docs.text: Getting started KTracer is a Kotlin RayTracer, which allows you to generate different Photorealistic Images. Get started in 5 minutes and begin having fun, letting out your creativity! Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Getting started
